column1: 1. Update prices daily from CoinGecko or DeFiLlama
2. Track entry/exit points for tax reporting
Risk Tolerance: Medium - willing to accept volatility for growth
Rebalancing Schedule: Monthly or when allocation drifts >5%
Emergency Fund: Maintained separately in stablecoins
Tax Strategy: Track all transactions for capital gains reporting
Unrealized P/L = (Current Price - Entry Price) × Quantity
% Change = ((Current Price - Entry Price) / Entry Price) × 100
Portfolio Allocation % = Asset Value / Total Portfolio Value × 100
